Subject: Unauthorized carriage of persone by alr: Rea::

Of late, some instances have come to the notice of this Hqrs wherein
persons not having valid entry pass/ permission entered into operational area
and embarked into non-scheduled/ chartered flights there from, without

adhering to the appropriate security measures prescribed by the competent
authority.

2. In this connection. Para No. (|) of BCAS Circular No. 5/2002 stipulates
that “ By arrangement with Alr Traffic Control, it should be ensured that no
non-scheduled civil flight is allowed to take off from an airport until and unless

the officer-in-charga, airport security has confirmed in writing that the security
checks have been carried out.”

3. It should be ensured that only the passengers with valid permission of
operational area are allowed to enter into the airside/ operational area and in
no case any person is allowed to go to the operational area without valid pass/
permission. The passengers who are embarking on the non scheduled/
chartered flights should pass through the Security Check area of the terminal
building and pre-emberkation security check of such passengers will be
carried out by the ASG in the SHA. In case of any non-compliance of pre-
embarkation security check, the ATC should be informed immediately.

4. Many a times, passengers of charter/State Govt. flights evade pre-
embarkation security checks by the ASG. In such cases, ATC should be
Informed immediataly as mentioned in the BCAS circular No. 5/2002.

5. Please acknowledge receipt and comply strictly.
